definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Authorities said hair dye containing lentine will be pulled off the shelves soon.
sentences.chinese: 相關人員表示，這些染髮劑將很快下架。

sentences.english: Do you use cosmetics or hair colorings?
sentences.chinese: 你有使用化妝品或染髮劑嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To study the subchronic toxicity of the oxidized hair dyes in mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究氧化型染髮劑經皮染毒對小鼠的亞慢性毒作用。

sentences.english: Mix the two, then use the combo on your hair.
sentences.chinese: 將兩種染髮劑混合後再給頭髮染色。

sentences.english: It’s found mostly in nail polish and hair dye.
sentences.chinese: 大多存在於指甲油和染髮劑中。

sentences.english: The gallic acid hair dye is used for black-dyeing of human hair.
sentences.chinese: 該沒食子酸染髮劑用於人發的染黑。

sentences.english: The definiens and the characteristics of hair dye were briefly summarized.
sentences.chinese: 簡要概述了染髮劑的產品定義及特性。

sentences.english: They share a pigment used in hair dyes, which can lead to problems down the line.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用染髮劑的一種色素，它可以完全導致過敏症。

sentences.english: If you buy dye "hair" red Puyallup in the end.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到底買紅染髮劑普雅路普。

sentences.english: The permanent hair dyes are special chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 永久性染髮劑是一種特殊的化學物質。

sentences.english: Objective To study the potential carcinogenic effect of S brand hair color cream on rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究S牌染髮劑對家兔的潛在性致癌作用。

definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
